verses.verse: Then <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> out of the <S%H5591>whirlwind,<s%>
"Who is this who <S%H2821>darkens<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> by <S%H4405>words<s%> without <S%H1847>knowledge?<s%>
<S%H247>Brace<s%> <S%H2504>yourself<s%> like a <S%H1397>man,<s%> for I will <S%H7592>question<s%> <S%H3045>you,<s%> then you answer me!
<S%H375>"Where<s%> were you when I laid the <S%H3245>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth?<s%> <S%H5046>Declare,<s%> if you <S%H3045>have<s%> <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
Who <S%H7760>determined<s%> its <S%H4461>measures,<s%> if you <S%H3045>know?<s%> Or who <S%H5186>stretched<s%> the line on <S%H6957>it?<s%>
Whereupon were its <S%H134>foundations<s%> <S%H2883>fastened?<s%> Or who <S%H3384>laid<s%> <S%H6438>its<s%> <S%H68>cornerstone,<s%>
when the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H3556>stars<s%> <S%H7442>sang<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> and all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> shouted for <S%H7321>joy?<s%>
"Or who shut <S%H5526>up<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with <S%H1817>doors,<s%> when it broke <S%H1518>forth<s%> <S%H3318>from<s%> the <S%H7358>womb,<s%>
when I <S%H7760>made<s%> <S%H6051>clouds<s%> its <S%H3830>garment,<s%> and <S%H2854>wrapped<s%> it in thick <S%H6205>darkness,<s%>
<S%H7665>marked<s%> out for it my <S%H2706>bound,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> and <S%H1817>doors,<s%>
and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5704><s%> 'Here you may <S%H935>come,<s%> but no <S%H3254>further.<s%> Here your <S%H1347>proud<s%> <S%H1530>waves<s%> shall be <S%H7896>stayed?<s%>'
"Have you <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1242>morning<s%> in your <S%H3117>days,<s%> and caused the <S%H7837>dawn<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> its <S%H4725>place;<s%>
that it might take <S%H270>hold<s%> of the <S%H3671>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and shake the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> out of <S%H5287>it?<s%>
It is <S%H2015>changed<s%> as <S%H2563>clay<s%> under the <S%H2368>seal,<s%> and <S%H3320>stands<s%> forth as a <S%H3830>garment.<s%>
From the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> their <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H4513>withheld.<s%> The <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> is <S%H7665>broken.<s%>
"Have you <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H5033>springs<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea?<s%> Or have you <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H2714>recesses<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep?<s%>
Have the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> been <S%H1540>revealed<s%> to <S%H7200>you?<s%> Or have you seen the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the shadow of <S%H6757>death?<s%>
Have you <S%H995>comprehended<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> in its <S%H7338>breadth?<s%> <S%H5046>Declare,<s%> if you know it <S%H3045>all.<s%>
"What is the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H7931>dwelling<s%> of <S%H216>light?<s%> As for <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> where is its <S%H4725>place,<s%>
that you should <S%H3947>take<s%> it to its <S%H1366>bound,<s%> that you should <S%H995>discern<s%> the <S%H5410>paths<s%> to its <S%H1004>house?<s%>
Surely you <S%H3045>know,<s%> for you were <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H4557>then,<s%> and the number of your <S%H3117>days<s%> is <S%H7227>great!<s%>
Have you <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H214>treasuries<s%> of the <S%H7950>snow,<s%> or have you <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1259>hail,<s%>
which I have <S%H2820>reserved<s%> against the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6862>trouble,<s%> against the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7128>battle<s%> and <S%H7128>war?<s%>
By <S%H335>what<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> is the <S%H216>lightning<s%> <S%H216>distributed,<s%> or the east <S%H6921>wind<s%> <S%H6327>scattered<s%> on the <S%H776>earth?<s%>
Who has <S%H6385>cut<s%> a <S%H8585>channel<s%> for the flood <S%H7858>water,<s%> or the <S%H1870>path<s%> for <S%H2385>the<s%> <S%H6963>thunderstorm;<s%>
To cause it to <S%H4305>rain<s%> on a <S%H776>land<s%> where no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4057>is;<s%> on the wilderness, in which there is no <S%H120>man;<s%>
to <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> the <S%H4875>waste<s%> and <S%H7722>desolate<s%> <S%H4161>ground,<s%> to cause the tender <S%H1877>grass<s%> to spring <S%H6779>forth?<s%>
Does the <S%H4306>rain<s%> <S%H3426>have<s%> a <S%H1>father?<s%> Or who <S%H3205>fathers<s%> the <S%H96>drops<s%> of <S%H2919>dew?<s%>
Out of whose <S%H990>womb<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> the <S%H7140>ice?<s%> The gray <S%H3713>frost<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> who has given birth to <S%H3205>it?<s%>
The <S%H4325>waters<s%> become <S%H2244>hard<s%> like <S%H68>stone,<s%> when the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep<s%> is <S%H3920>frozen.<s%>
"Can you <S%H7194>bind<s%> the <S%H4575>cluster<s%> of the <S%H3598>Pleiades,<s%> or <S%H6605>loosen<s%> the <S%H4189>cords<s%> of <S%H3685>Orion?<s%>
Can you lead <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H4216>constellations<s%> in their <S%H6256>season?<s%> Or can you <S%H5148>guide<s%> the <S%H5906>Bear<s%> with her <S%H1121>cubs?<s%>
Do you <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H2708>laws<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens?<s%> Can you <S%H7760>establish<s%> its <S%H4896>dominion<s%> over the <S%H776>earth?<s%>
"Can you lift <S%H7311>up<s%> your <S%H6963>voice<s%> to the <S%H5645>clouds,<s%> That <S%H8229>abundance<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> may cover <S%H3680>you?<s%>
Can you <S%H7971>send<s%> forth <S%H1300>lightnings,<s%> that they may <S%H3212>go?<s%> Do they report to <S%H559>you,<s%> 'Here we are?'
Who has <S%H7896>put<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> in the inward <S%H2910>parts?<s%> Or who has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H998>understanding<s%> to the <S%H7907>mind?<s%>
Who can <S%H5608>number<s%> the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> by <S%H2451>wisdom?<s%> Or who can <S%H7901>pour<s%> out the <S%H5035>bottles<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%>
when the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H3332>runs<s%> into a <S%H4165>mass,<s%> and the <S%H7263>clods<s%> of earth stick <S%H1692>together?<s%>
"Can you <S%H6679>hunt<s%> the <S%H2964>prey<s%> for the <S%H3833>lioness,<s%> or <S%H4390>satisfy<s%> the <S%H2416>appetite<s%> of the young <S%H3715>lions,<s%>
when they <S%H7817>crouch<s%> in their <S%H4585>dens,<s%> <S%H3427><s%> <S%H3926>and<s%> lie in <S%H695>wait<s%> in the <S%H5521>thicket?<s%>

Who <S%H3559>provides<s%> for the <S%H6158>raven<s%> his <S%H6718>prey,<s%> when his young <S%H3206>ones<s%> <S%H7768>cry<s%> to <S%H410>God,<s%> and <S%H8582>wander<s%> for <S%H1097>lack<s%> of <S%H400>food?<s%>
